title: Join Us
description: We are always looking for passionate researchers to join our multidisciplinary team. Whether you're a prospective graduate student, postdoctoral fellow, or visiting scholar, we welcome dedicated individuals who share our commitment to advancing health equity.
howToApply: Please send your CV, research statement, and names of 2-3 references to munjireen.sifat@jefferson.edu with the subject line 'SIFAT Lab Application - [Position]'.
